sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"不重要的，次要的"之意。
means: marginal ： 指处于边缘，幅度、范围小，故价值或重要性不大。
minor ： 多指与别的比较后显得不重要，或指较少、较小。
negligible ： 指数量小，不重要，微不足道或可忽略不计。
minimal ： 指最少、最低或最小。

sentence.Network_en: For low-paid workers, the marginal tax rate is at least 75%.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于低收入的工人来说，边际税率至少为75%。

sentence.Network_en: This is a marginal improvement on October.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是对10月份的一个小小改善。

sentence.Network_en: a marginal improvement in weather conditions

PerfectNetExp.abs: 石油词汇英语翻译(M)--石油百科 ... marginal well 边际井 marginal 边缘的 marginal-marine 滨海的.
六级核心高频词汇表878个 - 豆丁网 ... marble n. 大理石 321, marginal a. 记在页边的;边缘的 322, marsh n. 沼泽地,湿地 323.
经济学英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... M macroeconomics 宏观经济学 marginal 边际的 marginal benefit 边际收益.
chop logic 诡辩，公孙龙(名家学派)marginal adj. 页边的,边缘的解析：marginal subsistence 起码生活

list.abs: M开头的英文单词越多越好 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... march vi. 行军；游行示威 margin n. 页边的空白；边缘 marine a. 海的；海上的.
保证金(MARGIN)：以保证合同的履行和交易损失时的担保，相当于交易额的0.5%(200倍)～5％(20倍)，在客户开启合约头寸（建仓） …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from medieval Latin marginalis, from margo, margin- (see margin)

entry.def: If you describe something as marginal, you mean that it is small or not very important.

example.ex: This is a marginal improvement on October...
example.tran: 这是对10月份的一个小小改善。

example.ex: The role of the opposition party proved marginal.
example.tran: 结果显示反对党的作用微乎其微。

entry.def: If you describe people as marginal, you mean that they are not involved in the main events or developments in society because they are poor or have no power.

example.ex: The tribunals were established for the well-integrated members of society and not for marginal individuals...
example.tran: 特别法庭是为主流社会成员、而非个体设立的。

example.ex: I don't want to call him marginal, but he's not a major character.
example.tran: 我不想说他是个小人物，可他也不是什么大人物。

entry.tran: (席位或选区)边缘的，以相差无几的票数获胜（或失败）的
entry.def: In political elections, a marginal seat or constituency is one which is usually won or lost by only a few votes, and is therefore of great interest to politicians and journalists.

example.ex: ...the views of voters in five marginal seats.
example.tran: 选民对5个边缘席位的看法

entry.tran: （活动、花费、税项等）边际的，边缘的
entry.def: Marginal activities, costs, or taxes are not the main part of a business or an economic system, but often make the difference between its success or failure, and are therefore important to control.

example.ex: The analysts applaud the cuts in marginal businesses, but insist the company must make deeper sacrifices...
example.tran: 分析家们赞同削减边缘业务，但坚持认为公司必须作出更大牺牲。

example.ex: For low-paid workers, the marginal tax rate is at least 75%.
example.tran: 对于低收入的工人来说，边际税率至少为75%。

entry.def: Marginal land is not very good for growing crops or grass for animals.

example.ex: The poor are forced to farm in more marginal lands higher up the mountains.
example.tran: 穷人们被迫在山峦更高处的更为贫瘠的土地上耕作。

example.ex: ...helping farmers, so they do not have to exploit marginal lands.
example.tran: 帮助农民们，这样他们便不必开垦贫瘠的土地了。

means.word_mean: 1. at or constituting a border or edge;
3. of a bare living gained by great labor;
4. just barely adequate or within a lower limit;
5. producing at a rate that barely covers production costs;
6. of something or someone close to a lower limit or lower class;

auth_sentence.content: The case for a marginal Feds Fund Rate INCREASE.
auth_sentence.res_content: The case for a marginal Feds Fund Rate INCREASE.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The case for a marginal Feds Fund Rate INCREASE.

auth_sentence.content: Ponkrum grew slightly but remained a fairly marginal settlement.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ponkrum grew slightly but remained a fairly marginal settlement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ponkrum grew slightly but remained a fairly marginal settlement.

auth_sentence.content: Marginal taxes are a purer measure of economic damage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Marginal taxes are a purer measure of economic damage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Marginal taxes are a purer measure of economic damage.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: mur墙壁+al人,物,状态→adj.墙壁的 n.壁画
riv=river+al人,物,状态→竞争
affection爱;感情+al……的→adj.情感上的,爱情的
agriculture农业+al……的→adj.农业的,农艺的
clinic临床+al……的→adj.临床的,病房用的
con共同+gen出生+it+al……的→与生俱来
continent大陆+al……的→adj.大陆的,大陆性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 连续的,频繁的,持续不断的
stems_affixes.word_buile: continue连续+al……的→adj.连续的,频繁的,持续不断的
crime罪行+in+al……的→criminal犯罪的,刑事的

detriment磨擦+al……的→adj.损害的,造成伤害的
economic经济的+al……的→adj.节约的,经济的
education教育+al……的→adj.教育的;有教育意义的
emotion情绪+al……的→adj.情绪的,情感的
exception例外+al……的→adj.例外的,异常的

horizon地平线+tal=al……的→adj.地平线的,水平的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 附带的,伴随的,非主要的,偶然的,容易发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: incident偶然事件+al……的→附带的,偶然的

pastor牧人,牧师+al……的→adj.田园生活的,宁静的

Sentence.sentence: Still, at the most selective schools, where thousands of candidates may submit identically high grades and test scores, a marginal item like the essay may serve as a tie-breaker between two equally qualified candidates.

sentences.en: The marginal illustration is very interesting.

means.word_mean: 不重要的, 微小的, 少量的

sentences.en: The new law will have only a marginal effect on the lives of most people.
sentences.cn: 新法律对大多数人的生活不会有重大的影响。

sentences.en: This once important social group is becoming more and more marginal.
sentences.cn: 这个一度十分重要的社会集团越来越无足轻重了。

means.word_mean: 仅以微弱多数票获胜的

sentences.en: He won the most marginal seat by only two votes.
sentences.cn: 他只以两票的微弱优势当选。

jushi.english: The marginal illustration is very interesting.
He won the most marginal seat by only two votes.
jushi.chinese: 他只以两票的微弱优势当选。

jushi.english: The new law will have only a marginal effect on the lives of most people.
jushi.chinese: 新法律对大多数人的生活不会有重大的影响。
